alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee; Menifee; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 9:17PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Powell, northwestern Owsley, southeastern Estill, northeastern Jackson, south central Menifee, northwestern Breathitt, Lee and Wolfe Counties through 945 PM EST... At 917 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yellow Rock, or near Beattyville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beattyville, Campton, Fincastle, Tallega, Torrent, Vada, Whisman, Airedale, Zoe and Primrose around 925 PM EST. Stillwater, Gosneyville, Calaboose, Koomer Ridge Campground, Malaga, Pence, Trent, Bethany, Lane and Baptist around 930 PM EST. Simpson, Valeria and Paxton around 935 PM EST. THIS INCLUDES Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 37 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
